PART_ADDER_DESCRIPTION: An adder. The two input signals are summed and sent to the output pin. The output cannot be higher than a <high> signal.
PART_ADDER_PIN_1_DESCRIPTION: Both input signals summed together. The output cannot be higher than a <high> signal. If no power is supplied, this pin will output a <low> signal.
PART_ADDER_PIN_2_DESCRIPTION: The first input signal, which must be a value between <low> and <high>.
PART_ADDER_PIN_3_DESCRIPTION: The second input signal, which must be a value between <low> and <high>.
